thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com | 4 of 210
thread.title: Suzanne Smith

author: Suzanne Smith
title: Suzanne Smith
text: I decided to do my level 2 TA course online so that I could study at my own pace and get the diploma done quickly and in my own way. I used the e-careers support twice, once to enquire about timescales and another to enquire about how to obtain my completion certificate. Both times the support was prompt- and I love that it is available 24-7! The course was informative yet kept my attention as the different modules were split into different sections. I found that I could work my way through a module or 2, and then log out and quite easily find where I left last time. Great course, great website, very happy student!
